title: Career, KPR Institute Engineering and Technology, Autonomous Engineering Institution, Coimbatore, India
paragraphs: KPR Institute of Engineering and Technology has excellent opportunities to deserving candidates across academic, teaching, research and professional areas.

KPR Institute of Engineering and Technology (KPRIET) is ranked (101 - 150) band under the engineering category, (151 - 200) band in overall, and (51 - 100) band in Innovation in the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) 2023.

NIRF outlines a methodology to rank institutions in India with parameters of Teaching, Learning & Resources, Research and Professional Practice, Graduation Outcome, Outreach & Inclusivity, and Perception.

KPRIET supports students, research scholars, and faculty to invent and innovate engineering to the next level. Our proven teaching method, advanced learning techniques, deep research in engineering and internships for students advanced KPRIET to the new heights
Decided to join Team KPRIET? Explore the current openings at our official linked page
Ready to apply? Signup and apply here
Explore the benefits and recognition that KPRIET offers to its members
Consistently upskilling our students and faculty is a part of KPRIET culture
KPRIET focuses on building a culture of inclusion and diversity for everyone
Our values are the heart of KPRIET. Our values guide us and help what we do

World is transforming everyday. In the rapidly evolving engineering landscape, we have an Increased responsibility to transform the engineering education from traditional curriculum to meet the 21st century skills like Creativity, Critical Thinking, Collaboration and Communication. Through our unique and strategic approach we enable our students to learn beyond and prepare them for life long success.
